      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Set the bytebuffer to null to prevent any further access to the under lying data. This should be done before the channel is closed as the bytebuffer could be tied to the channel. Any subsequent access to the methods will fail with a null object exception.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface IDisposable
